10  fSpecials( 128 ),

17  fSpecials( aCopy.fSpecials ),
18  fCreators( aCopy.fCreators )

40  void KSGenGeneratorComposite::AddSpecial( KSGenSpecial* aSpecial )
41  {
42  if( fSpecials.AddElement( aSpecial ) != -1 )
43  {
44  return;
45  }
46  genmsg( eError ) << "cannot add special creator <" << aSpecial->GetName() << "> to composite generator <" << this->GetName() << ">" << eom;
47  return;
48  }
49  void KSGenGeneratorComposite::RemoveSpecial( KSGenSpecial* aSpecial )
50  {
51  if( fSpecials.RemoveElement( aSpecial ) != -1 )
52  {
53  return;
54  }
55  genmsg( eError ) << "cannot remove special creator <" << aSpecial->GetName() << "> from composite generator <" << this->GetName() << ">" << eom;
56  return;
57  }
58 
59  void KSGenGeneratorComposite::AddCreator( KSGenCreator* aCreator )
60  {
61  if( fCreators.AddElement( aCreator ) != -1 )
62  {
63  return;
64  }
65  genmsg( eError ) << "cannot add creator <" << aCreator->GetName() << "> to composite generator <" << this->GetName() << ">" << eom;
66  return;
67  }
68  void KSGenGeneratorComposite::RemoveCreator( KSGenCreator* aCreator )
69  {
70  if( fCreators.RemoveElement( aCreator ) != -1 )
71  {
72  return;
73  }
74  genmsg( eError ) << "cannot remove creator <" << aCreator->GetName() << "> from composite generator <" << this->GetName() << ">" << eom;
75  return;
76  }

78 
79  void KSGenGeneratorComposite::ExecuteGeneration( KSParticleQueue& aPrimaries )
80  {
81  vector< double > tPIDValues;
82  vector< double >::iterator tPIDValueIt;
83  fPidValue->DiceValue(tPIDValues);
84 
85  for( tPIDValueIt = tPIDValues.begin(); tPIDValueIt != tPIDValues.end(); tPIDValueIt++ )
86  {
87  KSParticle* tParticle = KSParticleFactory::GetInstance().Create( std::floor(*tPIDValueIt) );
88  tParticle->AddLabel( GetName() );
89  aPrimaries.push_back( tParticle );
90  }
91 
92  fCreators.ForEach( &KSGenCreator::Dice, &aPrimaries );
93  fSpecials.ForEach( &KSGenSpecial::DiceSpecial, &aPrimaries );
94 
95  // check if particle state is valid
96  KSParticleIt tParticleIt;
97  for( tParticleIt = aPrimaries.begin(); tParticleIt != aPrimaries.end(); tParticleIt++ )
98  {
99  KSParticle* tParticle = *tParticleIt;
100  if (! tParticle->IsValid())
101  {
102  tParticle->Print();
103  genmsg( eError ) << "invalid particle state in generator <" << this->GetName() << ">" << eom;
104  }
105  tParticle->ResetFieldCaching();
106  }
107 
108  return;
109  }
110 
111  void KSGenGeneratorComposite::InitializeComponent()
112  {
113  if(fPidValue == NULL)
114  {
115  genmsg(eError) << "NO PID VALUE" << eom;
116  }
117  fPidValue->Initialize();
118  fCreators.ForEach( &KSGenCreator::Initialize );
119  fSpecials.ForEach( &KSGenSpecial::Initialize );
120  return;
121  }
122 
123  void KSGenGeneratorComposite::DeinitializeComponent()
124  {
125  fPidValue->Deinitialize();
126  fCreators.ForEach( &KSGenCreator::Deinitialize );
127  fSpecials.ForEach( &KSGenSpecial::Deinitialize );
128  return;
129  }

131  STATICINT sKSGenGeneratorCompositeDict =
132  KSDictionary< KSGenGeneratorComposite >::AddCommand( &KSGenGeneratorComposite::AddSpecial, &KSGenGeneratorComposite::RemoveSpecial, "add_special", "remove_special" )+
133  KSDictionary< KSGenGeneratorComposite >::AddCommand( &KSGenGeneratorComposite::AddCreator, &KSGenGeneratorComposite::RemoveCreator, "add_creator", "remove_creator" );
134 
135 }
